sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowLeft, Heart, Brain, Shield, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; import './IngredientPage.css'; const IngredientPage = () => { const { name } = useParams(); // Sample data - in production, this would come from an API const ingredientData = { name: 'Grilled Chicken', description: 'Premium organic chicken breast, perfectly grilled to retain maximum nutrients', image: 'üçó', nutritionPer100g: { calories: 165, protein: 31, carbs: 0, fats: 3.6, fiber: 0, }, healthBenefits: [ { icon: , title: 'Muscle Growth', description: 'High-quality protein supports muscle repair and growth' }, { icon: , title: 'Brain Health', description: 'Rich in B vitamins that support cognitive function' }, { icon: , title: 'Immune Support', description: 'Contains selenium and zinc for immune system strength' }, { icon: , title: 'Heart Health', description: 'Low in saturated fat, supports cardiovascular health' }, ], vitaminsAndMinerals: [ { name: 'Vitamin B6', amount: '30%', dailyValue: 'of Daily Value' }, { name: 'Niacin', amount: '69%', dailyValue: 'of Daily Value' }, { name: 'Selenium', amount: '36%', dailyValue: 'of Daily Value' }, { name: 'Phosphorus', amount: '20%', dailyValue: 'of Daily Value' }, ], pairsWellWith: [ 'Quinoa', 'Mixed Greens', 'Avocado', 'Cherry Tomatoes' ], funFact: 'Chicken is one of the most consumed proteins worldwide and has been domesticated for over 8,000 years!' }; return (
Back to Explorer
{ingredientData.image}

{ingredientData.name}

{ingredientData.description}

Nutrition Facts (per 100g)

{ingredientData.nutritionPer100g.calories} Calories
{ingredientData.nutritionPer100g.protein}g Protein
{ingredientData.nutritionPer100g.carbs}g Carbs
{ingredientData.nutritionPer100g.fats}g Fats

Health Benefits

{ingredientData.healthBenefits.map((benefit, index) => (
{benefit.icon}

{benefit.title}

{benefit.description}

))}

Vitamins & Minerals

{ingredientData.vitaminsAndMinerals.map((vitamin, index) => (
{vitamin.name} {vitamin.dailyValue}
{vitamin.amount}
))}

Pairs Well With

{ingredientData.pairsWellWith.map((item, index) => ( {item} ))}

üí° Fun Fact

{ingredientData.funFact}

Try Salads with {ingredientData.name}

Discover delicious recipes featuring this nutritious ingredient

Explore Salads
); }; export default IngredientPage;
